Name: Taunt
Description: Draws a single enemy's (single-hit) attack to Juliette

Name: Boast
Description: Draw all enemy attacks to Juliette.

Name: Heckle
Description: Weak attack with a chance to daze.

Name: Untouchable
Description: When Defense or Magic Defense are decreased, evasion is increased. Levels for amount of increase.

Name: Misdirection
Description: Weak attack that decreases a target's accuracy by 10%.

Name: Flicker Counter
Description: If attacked, avoid and counterattack with a chance to daze. If no attack comes, suffer cooldown for a turn.

Name: Flicker Assault
Description: Zigzag forward into a focused strike, knocking the target into the enemy behind it.
